display_html:
data Result
  • = Success {
    • numTests ∷ Int
    • numDiscarded ∷ Int
    • labels ∷ !(Map [String] Int)
    • classes ∷ !(Map String Int)
    • tables ∷ !(Map String (Map String Int))
    • output ∷ String
    }
  • | GaveUp {
    • numTests ∷ Int
    • numDiscarded ∷ Int
    • labels ∷ !(Map [String] Int)
    • classes ∷ !(Map String Int)
    • tables ∷ !(Map String (Map String Int))
    • output ∷ String
    }
  • | Failure {
    • numTests ∷ Int
    • numDiscarded ∷ Int
    • numShrinks ∷ Int
    • numShrinkTries ∷ Int
    • numShrinkFinal ∷ Int
    • usedSeed ∷ QCGen
    • usedSize ∷ Int
    • reason ∷ String
    • theException ∷ Maybe AnException
    • output ∷ String
    • failingTestCase ∷ [String]
    • failingLabels ∷ [String]
    • failingClasses ∷ Set String
    • witnesses ∷ [Witness]
    }
  • | NoExpectedFailure {
    • numTests ∷ Int
    • numDiscarded ∷ Int
    • labels ∷ !(Map [String] Int)
    • classes ∷ !(Map String Int)
    • tables ∷ !(Map String (Map String Int))
    • output ∷ String
    }
name: Result Success Failure GaveUp NoExpectedFailure numTests numDiscarded labels classes tables output numShrinks numShrinkTries numShrinkFinal usedSeed usedSize reason theException failingTestCase failingLabels failingClasses witnesses

data Result
  • = Success {
    • numTests ∷ Int
    • numDiscarded ∷ Int
    • labels ∷ !(Map [String] Int)
    • classes ∷ !(Map String Int)
    • tables ∷ !(Map String (Map String Int))
    • output ∷ String
    }
  • | GaveUp {
    • numTests ∷ Int
    • numDiscarded ∷ Int
    • labels ∷ !(Map [String] Int)
    • classes ∷ !(Map String Int)
    • tables ∷ !(Map String (Map String Int))
    • output ∷ String
    }
  • | Failure {
    • numTests ∷ Int
    • numDiscarded ∷ Int
    • numShrinks ∷ Int
    • numShrinkTries ∷ Int
    • numShrinkFinal ∷ Int
    • usedSeed ∷ QCGen
    • usedSize ∷ Int
    • reason ∷ String
    • theException ∷ Maybe AnException
    • output ∷ String
    • failingTestCase ∷ [String]
    • failingLabels ∷ [String]
    • failingClasses ∷ Set String
    • witnesses ∷ [Witness]
    }
  • | NoExpectedFailure {
    • numTests ∷ Int
    • numDiscarded ∷ Int
    • labels ∷ !(Map [String] Int)
    • classes ∷ !(Map String Int)
    • tables ∷ !(Map String (Map String Int))
    • output ∷ String
    }
name: Result Success Failure GaveUp NoExpectedFailure numTests numDiscarded labels classes tables output numShrinks numShrinkTries numShrinkFinal usedSeed usedSize reason theException failingTestCase failingLabels failingClasses witnesses
